assetRequirements.purpose: To capture attention and evoke the feeling of an exotic beach getaway in Thailand during autumn.
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant, tropical, warm colors reflecting autumn sun
assetRequirements.content_context: Showcasing Thailand's beaches, clear waters, and autumn scenery to entice travel enthusiasts.

assetRequirements.purpose: Highlight the unique autumn experience in Thailand, emphasizing minimal rain and comfortable temperatures.
assetRequirements.visual_style: calm, soothing colors with elements of nature
assetRequirements.content_context: Illustrating the beauty of autumn in Thailand, focusing on family-friendly activities and excursions.

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в осень на экзотических пляжах Таиланда!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected hero". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
